title: High contrast stencil serif face, similar to Caslon No. 3
content:
Does anybody know what typeface is used in the collaterals for _[A Most Violent Year](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172533/http:/www.impawards.com/2014/most_violent_year_ver3.html)?_

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a_most_violent_year_type_4519.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content:
[Previous discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172533/http:/typophile.com/node/122933) on the topic. Still unsolved.  
I ended up thinking, like you, it could have been based on some Caslon, [Big Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172533/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/big-caslon) CC for instance.
Oh damn, I forgot to check if this had already been submitted. Sorry…
